analysis.key_quote: Making experts, or the unqualified political appointees replacing experts, beholden to the political whims of a President instead of the requirements of the constitution or the best interests of the US and its citizens, will be the end of Democracy, and the end of the American Experiment.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong concerns about the loss of expertise and the potential politicization of federal positions, indicating a clear opposition to the proposed rule.
